title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 17 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – May 17 2022
description:
Child abuse: FDA approves covid boosters for kids 5-11. Buck says, "Giving boosters to children, this is just an anxiety disorder that adults are playing out on their kids. This is Manchausen by proxy. This is a real mental health issue now." NYC heads back toward mask mandate. New WH Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre reads nonsensical climate change answer to straightforward question on inflation. Clay asks, "How is everybody in the Biden administration so bad at communication?... It's like she's a robot that suddenly got the wrong translation to read from." Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos sound just like us on clueless Joe Biden. PA Primary Day with C&B: Dr. Oz joins us with his closing argument.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
